We offer a full service getaway. All twin beds, 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, massage room, hot tub, swimming pool. We sit on 50 acres South East of Dallas. Just 30 miles to Canton First Monday Trade days. We have dedicated space for sewing, Scrapbooking, mixed media. (website hidden)

Daily during meal service- breakfast, lunch and dinner included.

Quiet, country
